Pre-Game Insights: Bradley Blalock is set to start for the Colorado Rockies on Thursday against Jesus Sanchez and the Miami Marlins.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies pitching staff is last in the majors with a collective seven strikeouts per nine innings.
Marlins pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.73 ERA this year, which ranks 28th in MLB.
First pitch is at 3:10 p.m. ET at Coors Field.
